}
default: {

if (

){

} else {

}

}
}
}
}
} else {

}
}
const filterAds = () => {
return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
setTimeout(() => {
gamObject.configYamlToJson = gamObject.configYamlToJson.filter((item) => {
return new RegExp(item.deploy).test(gamObject.pageResult);
});
// Get parameters about user status
let login = typeof getCmsCookie === "function" ? getCmsCookie('userStatus') : null;
// @var Global
window.isSuscriptor = typeof getCmsCookie === "function" ? getCmsCookie('suscriptor') : false;
// Get params or localStorages about webview
let paramsWV = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search)
let webviewAds = localStorage.getItem("webview") !== null || paramsWV.has("webview") || paramsWV.has("webview-ios");
if (typeof excludeAdsForSubscriptor === "function") {
// Desactivate some ads for user suscriptor or user webview
if ('suscriptor' === login || webviewAds) {
// Mobile webview is diffrent than suscriptor
// If it's webview, mobile and sucriptor take the adExcludeWebview
if (webviewAds && gamObject.adExcludeWebview) {
gamObject.configYamlToJson = excludeAdsForSubscriptor(gamObject.configYamlToJson, gamObject.adExcludeWebview);
} else {
gamObject.configYamlToJson = excludeAdsForSubscriptor(
gamObject.configYamlToJson,
gamObject.adExcludeSuscriptor
);
}
}
// Desactivate some ads for user registered
if ('login' === login) {
gamObject.configYamlToJson = excludeAdsForSubscriptor(
gamObject.configYamlToJson,
gamObject.adExcludeRegisteredUser
);
}
}
return resolve();
}, TIMER_NONBLOCK);
});
}
const setPrebid = () => {
return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
setTimeout(() => {
var adUnits = [];
for (const config of gamObject.configYamlToJson) {
if (!config.prebid) continue;
if (
typeof config.prebid.smartAdServerParams === "undefined" &&
typeof config.prebid.appnexusParams === "undefined"
) {
// Rubicon is not checking because its params (zoneId, sizes) may be optional
// Slot no tracking by prebid (e.g prehome)
continue;
}
objectConfig = {
code: config.tagId,
mediaTypes: {
banner: {
sizes: config.sizes.map((x) => { return [x.width, x.height] })
},
},
bids: [{ // Bid 1
bidder: 'rubicon',
params: {
accountId: '12938',
siteId: ['desktop', 'tablet'].includes(gamObject.GPT_DEVICE_NAME) ? '243522' : '250228',
}
}]
}
// Optional Rubicon params
if (typeof config.prebid.rubiconParams !== "undefined") {
if (typeof config.prebid.rubiconParams.zoneId !== "undefined") {
objectConfig.bids[0].params.zoneId = config.prebid.rubiconParams.zoneId;
}
if (typeof config.prebid.rubiconParams.sizes !== "undefined") {
objectConfig.bids[0].params.sizes = config.prebid.rubiconParams.sizes;
}
}
// smart Ad Server params (mandatory in some slots)
if (typeof config.prebid.smartAdServerParams !== "undefined") {
objectConfig.bids.push({ // Bid 2
bidder: 'smartadserver',
params: {
siteId: 22171,
pageId: config.prebid.smartAdServerParams.pageId,
formatId: config.prebid.smartAdServerParams.formatId
}
})
}
// Appnexus params
if (typeof config.prebid.appnexusParams !== "undefined") {
objectConfig.bids.push({ // Bid 3
bidder: 'appnexus',
params: {
placementId: config.prebid.appnexusParams.placementId
}
})
}
// Teads
objectConfig.bids.push({ // Bid 4
bidder: 'teads',
params: {
placementId: 152842,
pageId: 139288
}
})
adUnits.push(objectConfig);
}
// Ad units
pbjs.que.push(() => {
pbjs.addAdUnits(adUnits);
pbjs.setConfig({ priceGranularity: "dense" })
pbjs.requestBids({
bidsBackHandler: initAdserver,
timeout: PREBID_TIMEOUT
});
});
return resolve();
}, TIMER_NONBLOCK);
});
}
const initAdserver = () => {
return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
setTimeout(() => {
if (pbjs.initAdserverSet) return resolve();
pbjs.initAdserverSet = true;
googletag.cmd.push(() => {
pbjs.que.push(() => {
pbjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync();
});
});
return resolve();
}, TIMER_NONBLOCK);
});
}
const pushSlots = () => {
return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
setTimeout(() => {
for (ad of gamObject.configYamlToJson) {
var sizes = [];
if (ad.sizes && ad.sizes.length > 1) {
sizes = ad.sizes.map((item) => { return Object.values(item) });
} else if (ad.sizes && ad.sizes.length == 1) {
sizes = [ad.sizes[0].width, ad.sizes[0].height]
}
var breadcrumbSegments = ad.breadcrumb.split('/');
gamObject.SLOTS.push({
breadcrumb: ad.breadcrumb,
name: breadcrumbSegments[breadcrumbSegments.length - 1], // last element
tagId: ad.tagId,
sizes: sizes
});
}
return resolve();
}, TIMER_NONBLOCK);
});
}
const enableServices = () => {
googletag.cmd.push(() => {
if (window.googletag && googletag.apiReady) {
// Start and define slots head definition and define slot
var slot;
for (slotConfig of gamObject.SLOTS) {
if (slotConfig.name === "prehome") {
// Prehome out of page setup
// https://developers.google.com/publisher-tag/samples/display-out-of-page-ad
slot = googletag
.defineOutOfPageSlot(slotConfig.breadcrumb, slotConfig.tagId)
.setTargeting('outofpage', 'outofpage');
} else {
slot = googletag.defineSlot(
slotConfig.breadcrumb,
!slotConfig.sizes.length ? [] : slotConfig.sizes,
slotConfig.tagId
)
}
slot.addService(googletag.pubads());
}
// End slots head definition
//Start Lazy Load
//developer docs: https://developers.google.com/doubleclick-gpt/samples/lazy-loading
googletag.pubads().enableLazyLoad({
fetchMarginPercent: 100,
renderMarginPercent: 50,
mobileScaling: 2,
});
//End lazy load
//key values segmentation
if (typeof gamObject.pageId !== "undefined" && gamObject.pageId) {
googletag.pubads().setTargeting("recurso", gamObject.pageId.toString());
}
//End key values segmentation
googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs();
googletag.pubads().setSafeFrameConfig({
allowOverlayExpansion: true,
allowPushExpansion: true,
sandbox: true,
});
googletag.pubads().setCentering(true);
// Event listener
googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotOnload', (event) => {
var slotName = event.slot.getAdUnitPath().split('/');
// Slot name -> last element of getAdUnitPath()
slotName = slotName[slotName.length - 1];
var slotParentDiv = $("#" + event.slot.getSlotElementId()).parent();
switch (slotName) {
case "satelite": {
var satelite_div_container_inner = slotParentDiv.parent();
var satelite_div_container = satelite_div_container_inner.parent();
var satelite_btn_close = satelite_div_container_inner.find('.gpt-slot-close-btn');
satelite_div_container.css({
'width': '100%',
'height': '100%',
'background': 'rgba(50, 50, 50, 0.5)',
'position': 'fixed',
'top': '0',
'left': '0',
'z-index': '9999999'
});
satelite_div_container_inner.css({
'background' : 'transparent',
'width' : 'fit-content',
'height' : 'fit-content',
'position':'relative',
'top': '50%',
'left': '50%',
'transform': 'translate(-50%, -50%)'
});
// Show btn X
satelite_btn_close.removeClass('oculto');
// Show container
satelite_div_container.removeClass('oculto');
// When clic btn X remove
satelite_btn_close.click(function () { satelite_div_container.remove() });
// After 30 seconds remove automatically
window.setTimeout(function () { satelite_div_container.remove(); }, 30000)
}
break;
case "barra_flotante_inferior":
case "barra_fija_inferior": {
var barra_flotante_div = slotParentDiv.parent();
var barra_flotante_btn_close = barra_flotante_div.find('.gpt-slot-close-btn');
barra_flotante_div.css({
'z-index': '9999998',
'position': 'fixed',
'left': '50%',
'bottom': '0',
'transform': 'translate(-50%,0)'
});
// Show btn X
barra_flotante_btn_close.removeClass('oculto');
// Show container
barra_flotante_div.removeClass('oculto');
// When clic btn X remove
barra_flotante_btn_close.click(function () { barra_flotante_div.remove() });
}
break;
default: {
/*
Add class 'ad-display' to all slots ('.adunit-googleadmanager') excepts:
'satelite', 'barra-flotante-inferior', 'barra_fija_inferior'
*/
if (slotParentDiv.hasClass("adunit-googleadmanager")) {
slotParentDiv.addClass("ad-display");
/*
MARGEN HOME ET PLAY
Si el pageResult es "eltiempoplay" y carga el slot "robapagina_top" reemplazamos el margin
por una mas alto debido a que el menú esconde la visibilidad del mismo.
Cuanto el menú sea ajustado probablemente este condición puede quitarse.
*/
if (gamObject.pageResult === "eltiempoplay" && slotName === "robapagina_top") {
slotParentDiv.css({"margin-top": "120px"});
}
/*
MARGEN HOME ESPECIALES
Si el pageResult es "home-especiales"o algún artículo especial y carga el slot "robapagina_top" reemplazamos el margin
por una mas alto debido a que el menú esconde la visibilidad del mismo.
Cuanto el menú sea ajustado probablemente este condición puede quitarse.
*/
if (
(
gamObject.pageResult === "home-especiales" ||
new RegExp("especial_modular$").test(gamObject.pageResult)
) && slotName === "robapagina_top"
) {
slotParentDiv.css({"margin-top": "50px"});
}
}
}
}
/* Ajuste para mover pauta 'primer_robapagina' del home en tablet a posición visible por estilos */
if (
gamObject.GPT_DEVICE_NAME === "tablet" &&
window.location.pathname == '/' &&
slotName === "primer_robapagina" &&
$('.homepage-board.board-1.containt .board1-module.board1-module-v2.containt').length > 0
) {
slotParentDiv.appendTo(
'.homepage-board.board-1 .col-left .col1.no-margin .ad-container.ad-container-bottom-tablet.tablet'
);
}
/* Fin ajuste para mover pauta 'primer_robapagina' del home en tablet a posición visible por estilos */
});
// End Event listener
googletag.enableServices();
}
});
}
async function getGPT (e) {
// Set ads about device
setSettingsDevice();
// Filter ads
await filterAds();
if (gamObject.configYamlToJson.length) {
// Load JS
await loadJS(document, true, document.querySelectorAll("script[data-type='js-gpt']"));
// Start 2 "jobs" in parallel and wait for both of them to complete
await Promise.all([
(async () => await setPrebid())(),
(async () => await initAdserver())()
]);
gamObject.configYamlToJson.map((ad) => {
return ad.breadcrumb = gamObject.GPT_CLIENT_ID + ad.breadcrumb;
});
// Send slots
await pushSlots();
enableServices();
} else
{
console.warn(`No ad config found for section`);
}
return;
}
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", async (e) => {
// Load Utils JS
getGPT(e);
});

function logEvent(name, params) {

return;
}
if (window.AnalyticsWebInterface) {
// Call Android interface
window.AnalyticsWebInterface.logEvent(name, JSON.stringify(params));

};

}
